select * from
v_pending_supervisor where( ((monitor_status='special_attention' or monitor_status='warning') and alert_node='untreated') or (alert_node='feedback' or (table_name='personal' and alert_node='untreated')))
v_pending_staff where( alert_node='transfer' and (operation_id in (select Max(id) from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id = #{param.ldapId} group by uid) or operation_id in (select Max(id) from t_operation_detail where by_operation_people_id = #{param.ldapId} group by supervision_id)) and operation_name='transfer')
and document_number LIKE concat('%',#{param.documentNumber},'%')
and table_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.tableName},'%')
and alert_node =#{param.alertNode}
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY uid order by update_time desc

select * from
v_pending_staff where( (operation_name='transfer' or operation_name='finish') and operation_people_id=#{param.ldapId})
v_pending_staff where( operation_name='feedback' and operation_people_id=#{param.ldapId})
and document_number LIKE concat('%',#{param.documentNumber},'%')
and table_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.tableName},'%')
and alert_node =#{param.alertNode}
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
group by uid order by update_time desc
